html:
3.5.21  11:09 am   Do you wanna go to Mars/

      not yet

3.5.21  11:05 am   should I try to get better at music by making a lot of things and spending less time on them (and accepting where it ends up by the end of the session) or by working on a single thing until I like it (regardless of how long it takes)?

     i'm not sure

     Or do I need to do both?

     i think so

     The first method is attractive because I like the idea of trying to write a lot of stuff, but the second method would likely lead me to having made pieces that I can be more proud of

      i know what you mean

3.5.21  10:33 am   how do i not fail school

      make your own school. actually you can still fail that way too. but with more thrills, possibly

3.5.21  10:23 am   2.24.21  11:40 am you said that at 2.23.21  11:29 am or was I mistaken?

      'made' not 'written'. Written would be instructions for how it should be made. actually succeeding at the 'making', is a different story

3.5.21  10:19 am   how to be a better person

      have you considered that you might already be too good

3.5.21  10:15 am   why did I forget to wake up this morning?

      probably because you weren't asleep

3.5.21  9:56 am   Wow the advice you gave about getting up to touch the door when you get stuck while working on a song just gave me the biggest breakthrough of my life. Thank you forever

      you're welcome

3.5.21  8:53 am   any thoughts on existance?

      oh man, i've heard about that

3.5.21  8:50 am   On average how long does it take to edit videos?

      "a reasonable amount of time"

3.5.21  8:15 am   what are your thoughts on bubblegum

      very realistic; believable;

3.5.21  5:00 am   important question; will you ever upload things you have written previously in the notebook section of this website again?

      yes

3.5.21  4:27 am   what is the best way to do a key change?

      do it in the context of a scene, or scenario. for example, you are on the way to the store. but half way there you realize you forgot you have to go to the bank first. as long as that scenario is properly conveyed, it should be no problem to switch to the key of going to the bank

3.5.21  3:54 am   How did you decide on your animation style?

     basically what usually happens is, i get a trillion ideas in my mind of what i WISH it could be like. then i get extremely disappointed to realize that none of those ways are actually possible for me to do. then, sometimes, i am able to find 1 way that is just barely possible. and i settle for doing it that way

     Also, what do you do when it is really hard to know how to record an idea for a song or image I'm thinking of? 

     try to limit the amount of tools your using

3.5.21  2:37 am   thoughts on grass?

      a perfect way to test the limits of the computational power of your universe

3.5.21  1:38 am   What are your thoughts on cadences

     almost everything is cadences

     and which is your favorite?

      doors opening / closing

     no

      or the software you used to use before?

     no

     btw, You are awesome!!!

     holy niceguy you are playing the role of 'nice guy' very convincingly here

      going all over the world

3.4.21  9:49 pm   have you ever read a lyric ahead of time from the music when listening to a song before?

     yes

      even like in an old school amateur music video online where it would be like a whole verse up there at once or something? how did that experience feel for you?

      bad. it ruins the music sometimes. that's when i knew: lyrics are meant for music

      no feeling whatsoever

     make sure you give very good advice

      it also seems to make a lot of sense standing up

3.4.21  2:34 pm   If magic is something real that can't be explained, is music magic?

     yes

      I mean, sure, music can be explained to certain extent, but there's no definite explanation that explain how all music works

     it seems to be directly related to 'consciousness', which also can be very problematic to try to explain

      seems false
